item.ptxt: Positioning and degree of contamination of the filter cartridge.
Positioning and condition of the seals.
If there is metal swarf in the filter:
Replace the fuel filter, bleed the circuit and continue the fault finding procedure.

action.ptxt: Repair or replace the defective part.

testgroup.ptxt: Supplying the injection system with fuel from an additional tank.
This operation aims to detect possible faults in the low pressure supply system of a vehicle by replacing it entirely with an additional tank.

item.ptxt: Disconnect the diesel fuel supply pipe at the fuel filter inlet and seal it with a plug.
Connect a pipe to the fuel filter inlet and insert the other end in a clean container of approximately 5 liters.
Disconnect the diesel fuel return pipe at the pump return and injector leak-off junction and seal it with a plug.
Fill the container with clean diesel fuel.
Start the engine and let the system drain itself of its air (there must not be any air bubbles in the return pipe).

testgroup.question: Does the customer complaint persist?

action.ptxt: If the low pressure circuit is in order, reconnect the different pipes of the low pressure circuit and repeat the fault finding of the fault finding chart or of the fault that referred you to this test.

testgroup.question: Are the low pressure circuit connections in order and in good condition?

testgroup.ptxt: Check the condition of the priming pump, and that it is working properly. Perform repairs if necessary and continue the test.
testgroup.question: Is there in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace the defective part.

testgroup.ptxt: If the fault is still present with a low fuel level, check the consistency of the actual fuel level and that indicated on the combination meter.

item.ptxt: The fuel pump is supplied via a venturi pipe located underneath it.

testgroup.ptxt: Check that the opening of the venturi (6 to 8 mm (0.24 to 0.31 in.) in diameter) is not blocked by dirt contained in the fuel tank. Check the priming of the low pressure diesel fuel circuit.
testgroup.question: Is there in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace the defective part.

testgroup.ptxt: Ensure that the correct fuel is being used:

item.ptxt: Smell and compare the fuel with unpolluted diesel fuel:
to detect petrol, solvent, thinner, sulphuric acid (fuel with a white colour), water or fuel oil.

testgroup.ptxt: If the diesel fuel is not correct:

item.ptxt: Bleed the low and high pressure diesel circuit.

testgroup.question: Is there in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace the defective part.
